Description:
City-fringe renovated charmer
This brilliantly located renovated 1940s bungalow offers a simple, low maintenance lifestyle for a range of buyers.
The mix of old and new has been mastered successfully with retained features including front porch entry, high decorative ceilings and cornice, picture rails, simple diamond leadlight panes to front windows, brick fireplace in the lounge and polished timber floors.
The cosy, gas-heated lounge adjoins a dining/study room while the remodelled kitchen/meals feature stainless steel cooking appliances, ample cabinetry, split system a/s and sliding door access to the alfresco deck and a Euro-style laundry cleverly concealed in the corner.
All bedrooms include ceiling fans and the updated bathroom is home to a relaxing clawfoot, slipper-style bath, shower, WC and vanity.
The low-maintenance lot approx 433m² includes garden shed, off-street parking for two vehicles and compact side gardens.
The prime position is a 5-minute walk to the CBD with schools, LaTrobe University, sporting facilities, supermarket, local Post office and public transport all close by.
With excellent tenants in place until July 2020 (and they would like to stay longer), it's the ideal investment for a growing portfolio or the perfect nest for young singles or couples ready to spread their wings and buy their first home or retirees could make it a great home base between trips.

This sophisticated four-bedroom townhouse offers modern living in the ever-exclusive Kennington and not far from the vibrant Bendigo CBD. This impressive elevated residence is complemented by generous dimensions and outstanding amenities.
An expansive, open plan living, kitchen and meals area is sure to fit the whole family. The kitchen is appointed with stainless steel oven, gas cooktop and dishwasher. Adjoining the meals is the alfresco and courtyard, ideal for outdoor entertaining.
The accommodation comprises of four spacious bedrooms. The main bedroom at the front of the home is a whopping 4.6m x 4.4m + a walk-in robe and a large ensuite. The second bathroom is also of a good size and features a bathtub, shower, single vanity and a separate toilet.
Additional features include a full-sized laundry, evaporative cooling and ducted heating throughout and a double lock-up garage.
This awesome contemporary apartment is situated just 4 minutes walking distance to La Trobe University so is sure to make the perfect investment opportunity. The current tenants in place are paying $470 per week and keep the place in an immaculate state. You've also got Woolworths, Aldi and several eateries just down the road so you'll never have to travel far for your everyday needs.
Investors will snap this one up quickly so get in contact fast and book your private inspection.

Description:
KENNINGTON TOWNHOUSE - CLOSE TO EVERYTHING INCLUDING THE CBD!
Situated in a fantastic elevated location, this modern townhouse is neatly set up & has a current tenancy in place returning $340.00 per week, making it a highly sort after investment opportunity. Walking distance to Schools, La Trobe University, Kennington Reservoir & Kennington Village, Sporting Ovals, Supermarkets and the CBD, the townhouse is situated in a well established quiet street around the corner from a bus stop.
Offering peace, privacy and security. The front door opens off a raised timber decked porch leading into the main large living area and flows seamlessly into a modern spacious kitchen and open plan meals, with sliding door access to the large inviting rear paved alfresco. Plenty of storage and a lot of bench space to ensure modern living has been considered.
The spacious townhouse enjoys two quality sized bedrooms separated from the living areas of the property, each containing built-in robe's, blockout roller blinds and ceiling fans, This area of the townhouse also includes a modern bathroom fit with shower, bath and seperate toilet. Also offering convenient internal access through from the secure garage.
The rear of the property offers a generous sized alfresco/outdoor living area. This landscaped space has been designed with the outdoors in mind capturing the northerly aspect, offering a completely secure private yard and an abundance of room to enjoy outdoor dining, or just a peaceful relaxing space to take in the sunshine. The rear yard can also be accessed via the seperate laundry configuration at the rear of the garage.
Additional features include:
Split system heating and cooling
Tiled living areas throughout
Ceiling fans and WIR to bedrooms
Roller blinds to all windows
Modern kitchen and bathroom
Modern kitchen appliances including dishwasher, gas cooktop and under bench oven
Good storage throughout
Single garage with remote control access
Low-maintenance garden spaces
With nothing to do here, and offering plenty of room both indoors and out, situated in a quality centralised location, this neat property serves as a fabulous investment, or an easy-care home for a buyer seeking a low-maintenance property in a blue chip suburb. Kennington welcomes you.

Description:
A SURPRISE INSIDE!
Step back in time to this retro 1960's brick home, set on a sizeable allotment and located in a sought after neighbourhood of popular Kennington. Solid as a rock and packed full of character, the home oozes potential and offers so many different options for a discerning buyer to take advantage of. Only a few minutes to central Bendigo and convenient to local shops, schools and amenities, this little ripper would make a terrific first home, value add project or sound investment
Perched back from the road on the high side of the street, the home sits to one side of the large 846m2 (approx.) allotment. Featuring a split level floor plan that has been exceptionally well maintained through the years, so many options are available to renovate, modernise, extend, or live/rent comfortably as it is. Many original features remain, including beautiful big timber windows allowing loads of natural light, stunning hardwood floors, slate tile feature wall, timber book shelves, wood heater and high ceilings with exposed beams.
Three bedrooms provide accommodation, two are fitted with built in robes whilst the spacious master at the rear has its own small ensuite featuring shower and vanity, and views of the back yard. The main bathroom has been updated and boasts shower over bath, vanity and separate toilet. The open plan part of the home encompasses the kitchen, meals and lounge room, which is a delightful space to congregate. The kitchen is original but more than serviceable for the now until its time to update, whilst the meals space overlooks a sunken lounge room below. The lounge is awash with natural light thanks to the floor to ceiling windows along the front side and at one end is a funky slate feature wall that is a throwback to a bygone era!
Outside, the sizeable allotment offers plenty of scope for future ideas. As it stands, the private and secluded yard is established, with loads of room for pets, kids and a vegie garden to thrive. However, there is so much potential for future ideas including space for extending the home, a super outdoor entertaining area, or even a swimming pool down the track? There is a good sized shed in place that has concrete floor and power, and vehicle access to the rear yard through the carport and double gates at the front
So many options and so much potential here. All the ingredients of an astute real estate acquisition are here, including location and price point. So whatever the reason for your purchase, you will be suitably rewarded!
